problem_names:
lemma (in v0_v1_Digraph) subgraph_separation_extend:
  assumes "v \<noteq> v0" "v \<noteq> v1" "v \<in> V"
    and "Separation (remove_vertex v) v0 v1 S"
  shows "Separation G v0 v1 (insert v S)"

lemma (in v0_v1_Digraph) subgraph_separation_min_size:
  assumes "v \<noteq> v0" "v \<noteq> v1" "v \<in> V"
    and no_small_separation: "\<And>S. Separation G v0 v1 S \<Longrightarrow> card S \<ge> Suc n"
    and "Separation (remove_vertex v) v0 v1 S"
  shows "card S \<ge> n"

lemma (in v0_v1_Digraph) path_exists_if_no_separation:
  assumes "S \<subseteq> V" "v0 \<notin> S" "v1 \<notin> S" "\<not>Separation G v0 v1 S"
  shows "\<exists>xs. v0\<leadsto>xs\<leadsto>v1 \<and> set xs \<inter> S = {}"
translations: lemma (in Separation) finite_S [simp]: "finite S"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. finite S
using S_V finite_subset finite_vertex_set

proof (prove)
using this:
  S \<subseteq> V
  \<lbrakk>?A \<subseteq> ?B; finite ?B\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> finite ?A
  finite V

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. finite S
by auto

lemma (in v0_v1_Digraph) subgraph_separation_extend:
  assumes "v \<noteq> v0" "v \<noteq> v1" "v \<in> V"
    and "Separation (remove_vertex v) v0 v1 S"
  shows "Separation G v0 v1 (insert v S)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Separation G v0 v1 (insert v S)
proof (rule Separation.intro)

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. v0_v1_Digraph G v0 v1
 2. Separation_axioms G v0 v1 (insert v S)
interpret G: Separation "remove_vertex v" v0 v1 S

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Separation (remove_vertex v) v0 v1 S
using assms(4)

proof (prove)
using this:
  Separation (remove_vertex v) v0 v1 S

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Separation (remove_vertex v) v0 v1 S

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. v0_v1_Digraph G v0 v1
 2. Separation_axioms G v0 v1 (insert v S)
show "v0_v1_Digraph G v0 v1"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. v0_v1_Digraph G v0 v1
using v0_v1_Digraph_axioms

proof (prove)
using this:
  v0_v1_Digraph G v0 v1

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. v0_v1_Digraph G v0 v1

proof (state)
this:
  v0_v1_Digraph G v0 v1

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Separation_axioms G v0 v1 (insert v S)
show "Separation_axioms G v0 v1 (insert v S)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Separation_axioms G v0 v1 (insert v S)
proof

proof (state)
goal (4 subgoals):
 1. insert v S \<subseteq> V
 2. v0 \<notin> insert v S
 3. v1 \<notin> insert v S
 4. \<And>xs.
       v0 \<leadsto>xs\<leadsto> v1 \<Longrightarrow>
       set xs \<inter> insert v S \<noteq> {}
show "insert v S \<subseteq> V"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. insert v S \<subseteq> V
by (meson G.S_V assms(3) insert_subsetI remove_vertex_V' subset_trans)

proof (state)
this:
  insert v S \<subseteq> V

goal (3 subgoals):
 1. v0 \<notin> insert v S
 2. v1 \<notin> insert v S
 3. \<And>xs.
       v0 \<leadsto>xs\<leadsto> v1 \<Longrightarrow>
       set xs \<inter> insert v S \<noteq> {}
show "v0 \<notin> insert v S"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. v0 \<notin> insert v S
using G.v0_notin_S assms(1)

proof (prove)
using this:
  v0 \<notin> S
  v \<noteq> v0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. v0 \<notin> insert v S
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  v0 \<notin> insert v S

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. v1 \<notin> insert v S
 2. \<And>xs.
       v0 \<leadsto>xs\<leadsto> v1 \<Longrightarrow>
       set xs \<inter> insert v S \<noteq> {}
show "v1 \<notin> insert v S"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. v1 \<notin> insert v S
using G.v1_notin_S assms(2)

proof (prove)
using this:
  v1 \<notin> S
  v \<noteq> v1

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. v1 \<notin> insert v S
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  v1 \<notin> insert v S

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>xs.
       v0 \<leadsto>xs\<leadsto> v1 \<Longrightarrow>
       set xs \<inter> insert v S \<noteq> {}
next

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>xs.
       v0 \<leadsto>xs\<leadsto> v1 \<Longrightarrow>
       set xs \<inter> insert v S \<noteq> {}
fix xs

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>xs.
       v0 \<leadsto>xs\<leadsto> v1 \<Longrightarrow>
       set xs \<inter> insert v S \<noteq> {}
assume "v0 \<leadsto>xs\<leadsto> v1"

proof (state)
this:
  v0 \<leadsto>xs\<leadsto> v1

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>xs.
       v0 \<leadsto>xs\<leadsto> v1 \<Longrightarrow>
       set xs \<inter> insert v S \<noteq> {}
show "set xs \<inter> insert v S \<noteq> {}"
proof (cases)
assume "v \<notin> set xs"
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  v \<notin> set xs
have "v0 \<leadsto>xs\<leadsto>\<^bsub>remove_vertex v\<^esub> v1"

proof (prove)
using this:
  v \<notin> set xs

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. v0 \<leadsto>xs\<leadsto>\<^bsub>remove_vertex v\<^esub> v1
using remove_vertex_path_from_to \<open>v0 \<leadsto>xs\<leadsto> v1\<close> assms(3)

proof (prove)
using this:
  v \<notin> set xs
  \<lbrakk>?v \<leadsto>?xs\<leadsto> ?w; ?x \<in> V;
   ?x \<notin> set ?xs\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?v \<leadsto>?xs\<leadsto>\<^bsub>remove_vertex ?x\<^esub> ?w
  v0 \<leadsto>xs\<leadsto> v1
  v \<in> V

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. v0 \<leadsto>xs\<leadsto>\<^bsub>remove_vertex v\<^esub> v1
by blast
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  v0 \<leadsto>xs\<leadsto>\<^bsub>remove_vertex v\<^esub> v1
show ?thesis
by (simp add: G.S_separates)
qed simp

proof (state)
this:
  set xs \<inter> insert v S \<noteq> {}

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

proof (state)
this:
  Separation_axioms G v0 v1 (insert v S)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma (in v0_v1_Digraph) subgraph_separation_min_size:
  assumes "v \<noteq> v0" "v \<noteq> v1" "v \<in> V"
    and no_small_separation: "\<And>S. Separation G v0 v1 S \<Longrightarrow> card S \<ge> Suc n"
    and "Separation (remove_vertex v) v0 v1 S"
  shows "card S \<ge> n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. n \<le> card S
using subgraph_separation_extend

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?v \<noteq> v0; ?v \<noteq> v1; ?v \<in> V;
   Separation (remove_vertex ?v) v0 v1 ?S\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> Separation G v0 v1 (insert ?v ?S)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. n \<le> card S
by (metis Separation.finite_S Suc_leD assms card_insert_disjoint insert_absorb not_less_eq_eq)

lemma (in v0_v1_Digraph) path_exists_if_no_separation:
  assumes "S \<subseteq> V" "v0 \<notin> S" "v1 \<notin> S" "\<not>Separation G v0 v1 S"
  shows "\<exists>xs. v0\<leadsto>xs\<leadsto>v1 \<and> set xs \<inter> S = {}"
by (meson assms Separation.intro Separation_axioms.intro v0_v1_Digraph_axioms)
end
